app.joinmaillist: Join our mailing list to recieve MOFA new and event updated periodically.

registration.page.title: Registration
registration.mainpage.title: Registration
registration.pagetitle.para: Please complete the following form section with accurate and up-to-date company details to ensure a smooth and efficient processing of your request.
registration.dmcclabel: Dubai Multi Commodities Center Authority-Dubai Multi Commodities Center (DMCC)

companydetails.page.title: Company Details
companydetails.pagetitle.para: Ensuring data accuracy and security is our top priority. Kindly verify your details first and then the company contact number through OTP to complete the submission with confidence.
companydetails.nameofthebusinessaspertradelicense: Name of the Business as per Trade License
companydetails.second.page.title: Company Representative Details
companydetails.second.pagetitle.para: These provided details will serve as the credentials for accessing the company profile once it has been approved.
companydetails.Enter the verification code sent to: Enter the verification code sent to
companydetails.Kindlymakeanoteofyour: Kindly make a note of your
companydetails.forallfuturecomm: for all future communications related to your registration request.
companydetails.r1.note1: You have successfully submitted your request for company registration.
companydetails.r1.note2: Our dedicated agents will now review your application, and upon approval, you will receive a confirmation email at your registered email address.
companydetails.r1.note3: To proceed back to the main website, please click the button below.
companydetails.r2.note1: Thank you for submitting your request.
companydetails.r2.note2: We would like to inform you that your request has already been successfully submitted and is currently under process.
companydetails.r2.note21: Rest assured, our team is diligently working on it, and we will get back to you at the earliest possible time.
companydetails.r2.note3: Should you have any questions or need to communicate with us, please feel free to reach out at info@mofa.gov.ae, while kindly referring to your unique reference ID.

physicalAttestDetails.mainpage.title: Physical Attestation
physicalAttestDetails.paraPhysicalAttest: Please submit your request for physical attestation by completing the form below and attaching the invoice that requires attestation
physicalAttestDetails.para1PhysicalAttest: Our team will process your request promptly and ensure the necessary authentication for your document

landingPage.LoginProfile: Which company profile you would like to log in to?

companydetails.Name of the Business is required: Name of the Business is required
companydetails.Mobile Number must be 9 characters long: Mobile Number must be 9 characters long
